title: Strictly professional Dianne Buswell calls boyfriend Joe Sugg ‘the one’
text:
Strictly couple Dianne and Joe have been together for a year (Picture: Getty Images)

Strictly Come Dancing professional Dianne Buswell has called boyfriend Joe Sugg ‘the one’, a year after they first met performing on the hit BBC show.

The pair were partners for the 2018 season and denied any hint of a romance, although they later confirmed they were dating.

They have since moved in together, and now Dianne has shared a list of the reason he is her ‘one’ after a fan asked her how she knew.

‘The list is endless but here are a few things, he makes me laugh every single day, he is so caring not just for me but also others,’ she wrote.

‘He has the kindest heart, he is the most talented human I know but with all his success is still the most grounded person I have ever met, the list could go on and on.’

‘He has the kindest heart, he is the most talented human I know,’ said Dianne (Picture: Instagram)

While Joe and Dianne came close to winning the Glitterball trophy on the show last year, they were beaten in the finals to the top spot by documentary maker Stacey Dooley and her dance partner Kevin Clifton.

However, shortly after the finals came to a close Joe and Dianne announced that they were romantically dating.

He gushed: ‘I may not have won the glitter ball, but I’ve won something a million times more special.’

Dianne made the revelations about Joe as she headed home from hospital following a horror fall in rehearsals with new partner Dev Griffin.

Taking to Twitter on Saturday, she shared: ‘Morning everybody thank you for all the lovely msgs of concern.

‘We had an accident keyword being accident it was not devs fault at all these things happen.

‘But great news is I’m fine and we both can not wait to dance tonight xxxx thanks again for your thoughts and well wishes.’

Her words of encouragement come after it was reported Dev dropped her during rehearsals and she was rushed to hospital with Dev ‘doubled over in panic’ after the dancer came crashing to the floor.

Dianne was later discharged with whiplash.
